content:
Thusal Ranawaka Remember to ask unrelated questions in another channel (this one is specific to the EBM primitive task)

Sorry, I wasn't thinking enough.
@Sean Can you tell me how to extrude a 2D LibreCAD.dxf file to 3D model?
I know how to convert .dxf file to a .g file.

Sean Can you tell me how to extrude a 2D LibreCAD.dxf file to 3D model?

@Thusal Ranawaka if you import the dxf, you should end up with a sketch object. sketch objects can be extruded with 'extrude' object (run the "in" command)
